column1: Smoque BBQ////Some friends brought me here and it was a pleasant meal.  It's BYOB when you eat inside
column3: average priced for BBQ.  I enjoyed everything I tried from the menu here
column4: but I wanted to find a bbq sauce that was an A+ but didn't
column5: although theirs is good.  The beef brisket was good.  Not sure if they have any healthy side items
column6: but this is on par with other bbq joints.
